title.description: Title by which a person is addressed

forename.comments: Alphanumeric no consecutive spaces (i.e. a space can not appear adjacent to another space).

forename2.comments: Alphanumeric no consecutive spaces (i.e. a space can not appear adjacent to another space).

forename3.comments: Alphanumeric no consecutive spaces (i.e. a space can not appear adjacent to another space).

surname.description: Surname or Family name, e.g. Brown (CJS DSC v5 3.39 Family Name)

phone.description: A home telephone number, including any exchange of location code, at which a person or organisation can be contacted in the UK by telephonic means.

relationshipToDefendant.description: The nature of the relationship to the defendant.
